GeneralInformationRepository - Class in hippodrome
Class which represents an archive of all hippodrome's actions and memorabilia.
GeneralInformationRepository(int, int, boolean) - Constructor for class hippodrome.GeneralInformationRepository
Creates a General Repository of Information which saves a snapshot of all instants of time throughout a horse run game.
GeneralInformationRepositoryInterface - Interface in hippodrome
Interface of the class which represents an archive of all hippodrome's actions and memorabilia.
GeneralInformationRepositoryProxy - Class in server
General Repository of Information endpoint representation on the server side.
GeneralInformationRepositoryProxy() - Constructor for class server.GeneralInformationRepositoryProxy
Creates a General Repository of Information Proxy instance.
